briefs.title: BRIEF #001 - The New Cold War: Digital Espionage in the 21st Century
briefs.description: An analysis of how traditional geopolitical rivalries have evolved into sophisticated cyber warfare and digital espionage campaigns. This brief examines the changing nature of intelligence operations in the digital age.

briefs.title: BRIEF #002 - The Strait Tightens: Energy Chokepoints and Geopolitical Pressure
briefs.description: A strategic analysis of global maritime chokepoints, focusing on the Strait of Hormuz. This brief explores the impact of energy dependency, military tension, and trade vulnerabilities in shaping international pressure campaigns.
